place.name: HANNAH
place.gazetteerText: HANNAH, or HANNAY, a parish in Louth district. Lincoln; 2½ miles from the coast, and 4 NE of Alford r. station. It contains the hamlet of Hagnaby; and its post town is Alford. Acres, 1, 010. Real property, £1, 530. Pop., 140. Houses, 25. The manor belongs to Thomas Alcock, Esq. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £96. Patron, J. Grant, Esq. The church stands on an eminence. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
